meanings.sent1: The sumos competed in the ring with great strength.
meanings.sent2: I watched a sumos match on TV last night.
meanings.sent3: The sumos decided to have a friendly match on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The sumos of nature, the elephants, clashed in a fierce battle.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sumos grappling in the mud was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: There were many sumos gathered for the tournament.
meanings.sent2: I bought tickets to watch the sumos in action.
meanings.sent3: The sumos were all lined up neatly on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The sumos in the collection stood out with their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The sumos on display caught the attention of the visitors.
